name: Schema Discriminator 2
title: Schema Discriminator 2: Histology Discriminator for 8020/3
notes:
**Note:** A schema discriminator is used to discriminate for histology 8020/3: Undifferentiated carcinoma to determine which Stage Group table to use.
* **8020/3: Undifferentiated carcinoma with squamous component (see code 1)**
Use the Squamous Cell Carcinoma Stage Group Table
* **8020/3: Undifferentiated carcinoma with glandular component (see code 2)**
Use the Adenocarcinoma Stage Group Table
* **8020/3: Undifferentiated carcinoma, NOS (no mention of squamous or glandular component) (see code 3)**
Use the Squamous Cell Carcinoma Stage Group Table
rows: 16.1: Esophagus and Esophagogastric Junction: Squamous Cell Carcinoma
16.1: Esophagus and Esophagogastric Junction: Squamous Cell Carcinoma
Histology is NOT 8020, Discriminator is not necessary
